name: Zone X
description:
Zone X is a survival game with a capturing plot. On an island named Zone X an mishap has been occurred. You are a marine and are hired to investigate what has happened. On the island a slew of zombies is found. Therefore you should be careful with it. At the middle of the island there is a lab you must get access to. To acomplish this feat you must get a code that is located at the plants around the lab. Be careful! There are many anomalies and a lot of zombies craving for your flesh on the island.
Learn secret of the Zone X.

Vote Steam Greenlight

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/...
